Desc.entry: A church partnership project in Parson Cross, Southey and Longley involving all the Christian churches in the area and employing a Fresh Expressions community worker funded by the Methodist Church. The initiative is involved in developing and supporting a range of community projects, some of which are church based and some of which are not. In particular the initiative is exploring establishing a local "food bank", working with Grow Sheffield's Abundance harvesting project (see separate entry) and developing a "quiet garden" and healing place at Creswick Greave Methodist Church. Holds a monthly "messy church". The initiative is involved in working alongside local schools, community groups and other agencies.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Meet at various venues and times in Parson Cross, Southey and Longley area
